ygData.subject: Re: Class Poll
ygData.msgSnippet: Enchanter. they get the lull series from level 1, enabling them to solo a camp of mobs they get some kickass buffs they get a bodyguard pet and theyre
ygData.messageBody:
Enchanter.
they get the lull series from level 1, enabling them to solo a camp of mobs
they get some kickass buffs
they get a bodyguard "pet"
and theyre masters of trade

Fammuin, level 16 Erudite Cleric, Erollisi Marr
Fabno <Warriors of Apocalypse>, level 20 Erudite Enchanter, Erollisi Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: Blizzard
To: everquest@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 1:35 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Class Poll


Which class do you all think peaks the latest in the game in fun and power? I'm just interested to know what you think. Thanks for your time.
